thread.title: Stronger Dollar, Higher Treasury Yields Weigh on Gold

author: David Hodari
title: Stronger Dollar, Higher Treasury Yields Weigh on Gold

organizations.name: higher treasury yields weigh on gold gold

text:
Gold prices fell Tuesday, weighed down by a rebounding dollar and higher Treasury yields.
Front-month gold for February delivery declined 1.8% to $1,328.80 a troy ounce on the Comex division of the New York Mercantile Exchangeâ€”its worst day since July. A weaker dollar has helped push prices near their highest level since August 2016 recently, as a weaker U.S. currency makes gold and other dollar-denominated commodities cheaper for overseas buyers.
